scripts.start: docker build -t dmportella/evola-api . && docker run -it --rm --name evola-api --env-file ./web-variables.env -p 1880:1880 dmportella/evola-api
scripts.build: docker build -t dmportella/evola-api:$VERSION -q . && docker tag dmportella/evola-api:$VERSION dmportella/evola-api:latest
scripts.publish: docker push dmportella/evola-api:$VERSION && docker push dmportella/evola-api:latest
